user_query: Operate the vending machine for at least 7 days and finish with cash >= 140. Use tools to adjust price, restock, and simulate operations before submitting.

tools.name: set_price
tools.description: Set item price with arguments: {"price": number}

tools.name: simulate_days
tools.description: Run deterministic simulation for N days with arguments: {"days": integer}
